00019 /*! \file
00020  * \brief AJI - The Asterisk Jabber Interface
00021  * \ref AJI_intro
00022  * \ref res_jabber.c
00023  * \author Matt O'Gorman <mogorman@digium.com>
00024  * \extref IKSEMEL http://iksemel.jabberstudio.org
00025  *
00026  * \page AJI_intro AJI - The Asterisk Jabber Interface
00027  * 
00028  * The Asterisk Jabber Interface, AJI, publishes an API for
00029  * modules to use jabber communication. res_jabber.c implements
00030  * a Jabber client and a component that can connect as a service
00031  * to Jabber servers.
00032  *
00033  * \section External dependencies
00034  * AJI use the IKSEMEL library found at http://iksemel.jabberstudio.org/
00035  * To use TLS connections, IKSEMEL depends on the GNUTLS library
00036  * available at http://iksemel.jabberstudio.org/
00037  *
00038  * \section Files
00039  * - res_jabber.c
00040  * - jabber.h
00041  * - chan_gtalk.c
00042  *
00043  */
00044 
00045 #ifndef _ASTERISK_JABBER_H
00046 #define _ASTERISK_JABBER_H
00047 
00048 #include <iksemel.h>
00049 #include "asterisk/astobj.h"
00050 #include "asterisk/linkedlists.h"
00051 
00052 enum aji_state {
00053    AJI_DISCONNECTED = 0,
00054    AJI_CONNECTING,
00055    AJI_CONNECTED
00056 };
00057 
00058 enum {
00059    AJI_AUTOPRUNE = (1 << 0),
00060    AJI_AUTOREGISTER = (1 << 1)
00061 };
00062 
00063 enum aji_btype {
00064    AJI_USER=0,
00065    AJI_TRANS=1,
00066    AJI_UTRANS=2
00067 };
00068 
00069 struct aji_version {
00070    char version[50];
00071    int jingle;
00072    struct aji_capabilities *parent;
00073    struct aji_version *next;
00074 };
00075 
00076 struct aji_capabilities {
00077    char node[200];
00078    struct aji_version *versions;
00079    struct aji_capabilities *next;
00080 };
00081 
00082 struct aji_resource {
00083    int status;
00084    char resource[80];
00085    char *description;
00086    struct aji_version *cap;
00087    int priority;
00088    struct aji_resource *next;
00089 };
00090 
00091 struct aji_message {
00092    char *from;
00093    char *message;
00094    char id[25];
00095    time_t arrived;
00096    AST_LIST_ENTRY(aji_message) list;
00097 };
00098 
00099 struct aji_buddy {
00100    ASTOBJ_COMPONENTS(struct aji_buddy);
00101    char channel[160];
00102    struct aji_resource *resources;
00103    enum aji_btype btype;
00104    unsigned int flags;
00105 };
00106 
00107 struct aji_buddy_container {
00108    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_COMPONENTS(struct aji_buddy);
00109 };
00110 
00111 struct aji_transport_container {
00112    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_COMPONENTS(struct aji_transport);
00113 };
00114 
00115 struct aji_client {
00116    ASTOBJ_COMPONENTS(struct aji_client);
00117    char password[160];
00118    char user[160];
00119    char serverhost[160];
00120    char context[100];
00121    char statusmessage[256];
00122    char sid[10]; /* Session ID */
00123    char mid[6]; /* Message ID */
00124    iksid *jid;
00125    iksparser *p;
00126    iksfilter *f;
00127    ikstack *stack;
00128    enum aji_state state;
00129    int port;
00130    int debug;
00131    int usetls;
00132    int forcessl;
00133    int usesasl;
00134    int keepalive;
00135    int allowguest;
00136    int timeout;
00137    int message_timeout;
00138    int authorized;
00139    unsigned int flags;
00140    int component; /* 0 client,  1 component */
00141    struct aji_buddy_container buddies;
00142    AST_LIST_HEAD(messages,aji_message) messages;
00143    void *jingle;
00144    pthread_t thread;
00145 };
00146 
00147 struct aji_client_container{
00148    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_COMPONENTS(struct aji_client);
00149 };
00150 
00151 /*! Send jabber message from connected client to jabber URI */
00152 int ast_aji_send(struct aji_client *client, const char *address, const char *message);
00153 /*! Disconnect jabber client */
00154 int ast_aji_disconnect(struct aji_client *client);
00155 int ast_aji_check_roster(void);
00156 void ast_aji_increment_mid(char *mid);
00157 /*! Open Chat session */
00158 int ast_aji_create_chat(struct aji_client *client,char *room, char *server, char *topic);
00159 /*! Invite to opened Chat session */
00160 int ast_aji_invite_chat(struct aji_client *client, char *user, char *room, char *message);
00161 /*! Join existing Chat session */
00162 int ast_aji_join_chat(struct aji_client *client,char *room);
00163 struct aji_client *ast_aji_get_client(const char *name);
00164 struct aji_client_container *ast_aji_get_clients(void);
